name: Gedoem
description: A small game prototype made by my group at Harrisburg University of Science and Technology along with our Game Designer in Residence, Mike Stout (Insomniac, Activision). It's a desert survival game with a "mostly" functional tutorial and some cool music (that I definitely do not have the right to). This version only runs on Mac OSX because I couldn't figure out how to get the Windows version (which comes in three parts when exported from Unity) to post on here.
